it.polimi.se2019.view

Class InitialSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.InitialSceneController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class InitialSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    this class controls the initial scene of the game
    Author:
    LudoLerma, FedericoMainettiGambera

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void connectionFailed()
      in case the connection attempt fails, this function is called, it enable the user to make a second attempt
      private void connectionSuccessful()
      in case the connection attempt succeds, this function is called and the loading scene is called
      private InitialSceneController getInitialSceneController() 
      void initialize(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      initialize the scene
      void onCLIHyperlinkPressed()
      if the Cli hyperlink is pressed, the stage is hidden and the cli mode game is started
      void onEnterPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      if the user hit the enter key, the game is started
      void onReadRulesPressed() 
      void onRMISelected()
      if the rmi connection is selected, the port text field is disabled
      void onSocketSelected()
      if the socket connection is selected, the port text field is abled
      void onStartButtonPressed()
      when the start button is pressed, the input inserted are parsed
      private void parseInputs()
      parse the input inserted in the initial scene such as the ip, the port, the nickname and the method connection and attempt a connection
      private void wrongInputs()
      in case some of the input isn't correct, this function is called it shows a message of error near by the wrong field inserted
